name: DEDE Delicate Daily Leave In Mist
categories: Hair, Hair Styling & Treatments, Leave-In Conditioner
about: What it is:A lightweight leave-in moisturizing hair mist that reduces frizziness and flyaways for detangled, manageable hair that's not weighed down..Hair Texture:Straight, Wavy, Curly, and Coily.Hair Type:Fine.Hair Concerns:- Shine.Key Benefits:- Gentle leave-in conditioner for all types of hair.Highlighted Ingredients:- Red Celery Extract: Full of mineral salts and high water content for nourishment and cleansing..Ingredient Callouts:This product is vegan..What Else You Need to Know:Infused with red celery extract, it gently softens and nourishes hair, for silky smooth, shiny style. Slow Food Presidia support small producers so they can continue to grow traditional and artisanal products and plants that are at risk of disappearing.
ingredients: -Red Celery Extract: Full of mineral salts and high water content for nourishment and cleansing...Aqua / Water / Eau, Amodimethicone, Benzyl Alcohol, Polysorbate 20, Parfum / Fragrance, Sodium Benzoate, Polyquaternium-11, Panthenol, Cetrimonium Chloride, Citric Acid, Trideceth-12, Apium Graveolens Extract / Apium Graveolens (Celeryl) Extract, Cyclopentasiloxane, Hydrolyzed Sweet Almond Protein, Benzyl Salicylate, Linalool, Citronellol, Hydroxycitronellal, Phenoxyethanol, Caprylyl Glycol, Limonene, Ci 19140 / Yellow 5, Ci 14700 / Red 4.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-After shampooing, apply five to ten sprays to towel dried hair for detangling. .-Comb through and proceed with styling.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This has amodimethicone high up on the ingredients list. I love how it doesnt weight my hair down and it really leaves my hair super soft. The spray bottle sucks and spills I had to change it to another bottle. Im falling in love with Davines products.
